refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the lengths of the columns of the current row in the result set

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
Object oriented style (property):
mysqli_result arraylengths
Procedural style:
arraymysqli_fetch_lengths mysqli_resultresult
The mysqli_fetch_lengths function returns an array containing the lengths of every column of the current row within the result set.
